title: Integrating New Chicks to Existing Flocks Q&A Chicken Raising
itunes:title: Integrating New Chicks to Existing Flocks Q&A Chicken Raising
description: Learn how to integrate new chicks into existing flocks, plus, all your questions on mixing meat birds with laying hens and how to keep dual-purpose chickens. Common mistakes you NEED to avoid for the health of your chickens and what to do if your chicken is being bullied by the rest of the flock. Resources at https://melissaknorris.com/259
